statements: SELECT * FROM messages;
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 100;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE is_read = FALSE;
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE message_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 200 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND is_read = true ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 5 AND message_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sender_id ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages WHERE is_read = false GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%' OR message_text LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY message_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT name, email FROM instructors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT id, name FROM instructors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM instructors;
SELECT * FROM instructors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM instructors WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id > 100 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 102 AND receiver_id = 105;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name, email FROM Instructors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY instructor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Messages ON Students.student_id = Messages.receiver_id WHERE Messages.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM instructor_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_content, sender_id, receiver_id FROM student_messages WHERE sender_id = '123';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM instructors WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE program = 'Computer Science' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM instructor_messages WHERE instructor_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM student_messages WHERE student_id = 3 AND message_type = 'urgent'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM instructor_messages WHERE instructor_id = 2
SELECT students.student_name, instructors.instructor_name FROM students INNER JOIN instructors ON students.student_id = instructors.student_id WHERE students.student_grade = 'A'
SELECT MAX(message_id) AS highest_message_id FROM student_messages
SELECT * FROM Instructor;
SELECT instructor_id, instructor_name FROM Instructor ORDER BY instructor_id DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Message WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT attachment_id, attachment_url FROM Attachment WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Instructor WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Student WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM Message WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3;
SELECT attachment_url FROM Attachment WHERE message_id = 4;
SELECT participant1_id, participant2_id FROM Conversation WHERE conversation_id = 5;
